scripts.prod: bun run build && cp -R ./data ./build/data && cd ./build && bun ./index.js
scripts.docker:build: bun run docker:clean || true && docker build --pull -t fs-app-image .
scripts.postdocker:run: docker commit fs-app-container fs-app-image || true && docker:rm
scripts.docker:clean: npm run docker:rm || true && docker rmi fs-app-image
scripts.docker:prune: docker:clean || true && docker volume rm fs-app-volume || true && docker compose down -v
scripts.docker:dev: docker compose up fs-app-dev --build --watch --remove-orphans && docker compose down --rmi local
scripts.docker:test: bun run docker:build && bun run docker:run run test
scripts.docker:test:watch: docker compose up fs-app-test --build --watch --remove-orphans && docker compose down --rmi local
scripts.docker:prod: bun run docker:build && bun run docker:run run prod
